metadata.title: CVE-2017-12449 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: The _bfd_vms_save_sized_string function in vms-misc.c in the Binary FileDescriptor (BFD) library (aka libbfd), as distributed in GNU Binutils 2.29and earlier, allows remote attackers to cause an out of bounds heap readvia a crafted vms file.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
